channel.title: ttime on Shallow and Pedantic
channel.description: Recent content in ttime on Shallow and Pedantic

item.title: Tracking TTime
item.description: Ditz was lost in the mists of time, and I guess if ttime were maintained, issues would be tracked using Github. I’ve added issue tracking for ttime using the fantastic ditz. I’ve also added ttime’s rdoc documentation. (Note: Version 0.8.5 is out)

item.title: Been working on TTime
item.description: I’ve found myself working on TTime, the Technion Timetable Scheduler, quite a bit lately. Lots of cool stuff went in: Boaz Goldstein’s TCal, a Cairo-based schedule renderer (could you believe the old version used MozEmbed?) Sports courses are now correctly parsed Ability to select specific lectures and groups for the automated scheduler A manual scheduler - given an existing schedule, you can ask to show all alternatives at once, and hand-pick them.

item.title: Scheduling
